title: Crew Show (Lucid Trip; Crazy RS3; Why Racing Costs So Much)
description:
Matt is back from his Lucid Air Performance Arizona road-trip and it didn't all go according to plan. We talk about aero efficiency, range estimates, power requirements, and yes, charging issues. Zack drove a 10-second Audi RS3 and the Range Rover has some technological traits that relate to the Lucid. Plus, Q&A about why racing is expensive, a mythical 335i vs 2022 Nissan Z match, bad AMG ideas, and watches. 

Recorded May 11, 2022 

 

Evercoat Body Shop takes the guesswork out of body work. Available at Advance Auto Part stores.
 

Just visit masterworks.io and use promo code TIRE to learn how Masterworks is changing the game, 
 

Go to SimpliSafe.com/TIRE and claim a free indoor security camera plus 20% off with Interactive Monitoring.

 

Get your free LMNT Sample Pack. That’s 8 single serving packets FREE - Just cover the cost of shipping ($5 for US customers) at DrinkLMNT.com/TIRE

 

Want your question answered? Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
